title: Game Engine Developer
description: Developed a custom game engine using C++ with real-time rendering via OpenGL. Implemented UI using ImGui and created a component-based architecture with CMake build support.

title: Graphics Tools Engineer
description: Worked on internal tools for artists and designers using C# and WinForms. Integrated live rendering previews with OpenGL, and built custom plugins to extend ImGui behavior.

title: Full Stack Web Developer Intern
description: Built admin dashboard and internal tools for managing cloud storage on Amazon S3. Used React with TypeScript and Node.js for backend APIs. Handled authentication, file uploads, and data visualization.

title: Automation & Scripting Engineer
description: Created internal automation scripts and devtools for game asset management using Python. Automated build pipelines and setup Premake scripts for multi-platform builds.
